channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 22:17 Air alert in Odesa region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 22:17 Air alert in Odesa region. Follow further messages. #Odessa_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 22:08 Air alert in Cherkasy region. Stay tuned for further messages.

item.title: 🔴 22:01 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 22:01 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
